short_summary: Global Positioning System (GPS) for a John Deere 6400 tractor
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by March 11, 2024 at 2:00 PM EDT All bids submitted after 2:00 PM EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive. Canada is seeking offers from Offerors to provide Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC) Brandon Research & Development Centre (BRDC) Soil Health and Nutrient Management group one (1) Global Positioning System (GPS) for a John Deere 6400 tractor, that is compatible with existing John Deere 3000 Stationary RTK Base Station currently installed and being used at AAFC BRDC for other agricultural equipment.

full_summary:
Global Positioning System (GPS) for John Deere 6400 Tractor
================================yun
A public tender notice has been issued to select a vendor to provide a Global Positioning System (GPS) for a John Deere 6400 tractor. The contractor for Agriculture and Agri-food Canada (AAFC) Brandon Research and Development Centre (BRDC) requires a compatible GPS system for their existing John Deere 3000 Stationary RTK Base Station.

Key Tender Details
-------------------
* **Project Reference Number**: WS4426192336
* **Country/Region**: Canada, specifically Brandon
* **Tender Profile**:
	+ Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
	+ Notice Type: Request for Proposal
	+ Selection Criteria: Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Notice URL**: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18782571?extsite=MTg3ODI1NzFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18782571?extsite=MTg3ODI1NzFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
* **Closing Date**: March 11, 2024, @ 2:00 PM EST
* **Amendment Date**: February 28, 2024
* **Notice Status**: Expired

### Contact Information
In case of any clarifications or issues, please reach out to Matthew Havrilenko (PSPC/SPAC) by sending an email to: [matthew.havrilenko@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:matthew.havrilenko@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Background Information
Canada is seeking an offer for a Global Positioning System (GPS) that is compatible with their existing John Deere 3000 Stationary RTK Base Station installed for other agricultural equipment.
